resources.string: Oh My! We found a Corona virus correlation!
Click here to see a details

To be able to verify if you were in places where people which are 
 infected with Corona virus please allow us to get location permission. 
 We will take your location every 15 minutes and we will store it only on your device.
 The data will be not sent to anyone automatically not even to Ministry of Health.
No, I am not interested for the moment
Please approve connection to your location
The app which will help us to stop spreading the Corona virus in Israel

The application is showing confirmed places and times where and when people sick with Corona virus visited. The application also allows you to store on in a secured mode and private the places where you visited and to connect to the places where the sick people where and to understand if you are in the potential sickness group.
I was not confirmed with COVID-19
The app which will help us to stop spreading the Corona virus in Israel
Please approve connection to your location history
To be able to download and to use your location history we need permission to storage of the device to save the file
It\'s not possible to use the app without location permission
Please start location services in the device settings
Please approve using the storage of the device

To be able to cross between corona virus path and your location we need the data from Google timeline for last 14 days.
 This information will be downloaded only to your device and stored only on it and will not be sent or shared with anyone.
 When you will press the button we will open the browser
 If you are connected with your Google account we will download the file to your device and we will ask for permission 
 to read the file from the downloads directory from your device.

To be able to cross between corona virus path and your path please allow us to get your location.\n Your location will be taken only every 15 minutes and will be stored on the device only in a secured way.\n The data will be not be sent to anyone automatically not even to the Health Ministry.
